attributes.action: remove visa waiver into the usa and pay a set fee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Visa waiver into the usa is unfair you should pay like $20.00 to enter the us and they can check the most important details and where you are staying this will make us closer to the america ban any sort or trerror act or somthing close to it. it taken my brother 5hr to get through us immagration and he is a sargent in the police
Prime Minster should help us

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
